title: Exact Solutions of G-Invariant Chiral Equations
abstract: We give a methodology for solving the chiral equations $(\alpha g_{,z} g^{-1})_{,\overline z} + (\alpha g_{,\overline z} g^{-1})_{,z} \ = \ 0 $ where $g$ belongs to some Lie group $G$. The solutions are writing in terms of Harmonic maps. The method could be used even for some infinite Lie groups. (Preprint CIEA-gr-94/06)
